text: Claude Brasseur (15 June 1936 – 22 December 2020) was a French actor. From the late 1950s until two years before his death, Brasseur appeared in 150 movies and television productions. He was known for his role as Arthur in Jean-Luc Godard's Bande à part (1964). Brasseur played the lead role in the early 1970s historical crime television series The New Adventures of Vidocq. Brasseur died on 22 December 2020 in Paris, at the age of 84.Claude Brasseur est mort ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Claude Brasseur
